document.full_text: the call for help came the morning after a killer tornado pulverized a section of birmingham 10 days ago. gordon smelley and his "chainsaw gang" of 11 from the first baptist church in clanton, alabama started their trailer and headed out.
document.title: in tornado-ravaged bible belt, churches mobilize to help
lines_and_colors: the call for help came the morning after a killer tornado pulverized a section of birmingham 10 days ago. gordon smelley and his "chainsaw gang" of 11 from the first baptist church in clanton, alabama started their trailer and headed out.
